001.name: Charlotte
001.text: Wake up you can't sleep in there all day.

001.name: Charlotte
001.text: No today you have an important mission today.

001.name: Charlotte
001.text: Now or should I get your father?

001.name: You
001.text: No.. *Walks out of the room* so what is this mission you speak of?

001.name: Charlotte
001.text: It's time to sell some of the vegetables in the city and you will be the one selling them.

001.name: Charlotte
001.text: Love you have a safe trip

002.text: You see him loading a cart with boxes

002.name: Oliver
002.text: Hi i'm just about finished here so you can get on your way to the city.

002.name: Oliver
002.text: Now when you're on the road keep an eye out for trouble.

002.name: You
002.text: Yes dad i know i will be careful

003.name: You
003.text: Oh no a wolf, weird it looks to be alone

003.name: You
003.text: I hope i can kill it.

003.name: You
003.text: I hope there won't be any more problems.

004.name: You
004.text: I'm glad i didn't run into any other problems and now i can sell this wolf pelt.

004.name: Shopkeep
004.text: Hello sir what can i do for you today.

004.name: You
004.text: hi i have vegetables and a wolf pelt to sell.

004.name: Shopkeep
004.text: Good here you go sir, impressive kill. Not all people can handle themselves out there.

005.text: You see your village in flames

005.name: You
005.text: No what is this please no.
You see the bodies of several dead villagers scattered around the village.
You see more bodies as you reach you house, you go to open the door.
You are met with the horrific visual of your father impaled to the wall, and your mothers lifeless body lying on the ground.
You run over to your mother and cradle her lifeless body
You stand over graves you made for your parents

005.name: You
005.text: I need to go and get some help from the lord. I swear to both of you I will get justice for this and the bandits will not go unpunished.

006.text: You arive at the gates of the town, and walk up to the guards

006.name: You
006.text: I need to speke to the lord. I have urgent news.

006.name: Guard 1
006.text: The lord is busy right now present so run along.

006.name: You
006.text: Please sir I have to see him. It is important.

006.name: Guard 1
006.text: Listen kid the lord has a lot on his plate and he doesn't ne-

006.name: Guard 2
006.text: Come on he might have news the lord would like to hear let take him there.

006.name: Guard 1
006.text: *sigh* Fine but you will buy me a drink later.

007.name: Lord Erok
007.text: And then we position… hello young man.

007.name: You
007.text: Hi my lord I come from the village south of the city cald Karion. My village has been attacked.

007.name: Lord Erok
007.text: Who attacked this village was it Estrace soldiers.

007.name: You
007.text: No my lord it was bandits.

007.name: Lord Erok
007.text: Okay but we can't just give our soldiers when we are in need of protecting our border.

007.name: Lord Erok
007.text: Listen boy we are in a potential crisis but I understand your struggle and I am sorry about your village.

007.name: Thinking
007.text: He understands how could he ever understand

007.name: You
007.text: My lord if you truly understand my problem you would send some men to deal with the problem. I'm not asking for an army.
You are escorted out of the hall.

008.name: Shopkeep
008.text: Sir i was robbed near xxxx woods and i need help recovering my son and my wagon.

008.name: Guard 1
008.text: We will look into it as soon as possible.

008.name: Shopkeep
008.text: Please sir they have my son you need to help now i beg you.

008.name: Guard 2
008.text: Sir we are very busy and we can't leave the city every time someone has a problem.

009.text: You are walking in the woods of xxxx and you find a campfire  and a body of a small child beaten to death he old be no more than eleven. The ground is still warm so they must be close. I have to find them.
You find a map of bandit bases.

010.name: You
010.text: Finally after all those bases i have found where the boss is, my revenge will be complete but what will I do after it is finished? I hope I can settle down on a farm like my mom and dad.

011.name: Bandit Boss
011.text: How did you get in here? How did you get past the guards?

011.name: You
011.text: Your guards are dead and I am here to kill you.

011.name: Bandit Boss
011.text: But you're just a kid no older than 20. Who sent you whas it Lord Erok?

011.name: You
011.text: No i am here for revenge you killed my parents my family my village everyone i ever know.

011.name: Bandit Boss
011.text: What just simple revenge nothing more.

011.name: Bandit Boss
011.text: Well if this is the end of your revenge but i think you deserve a name on your revenge. My name is Floyd, what is your name.

011.name: You
011.text: You can call me by my family name Mercer and my village is Karion.

012.text: You stand over Floyd ready to kill.

012.name: Floyd
012.text: Y..you think this will end with me then you are a fool.

012.name: You
012.text: I don't know but it will feel a lot better.

012.name: You
012.text: Well let's see what he has on him
You find some money and a parchment with orders to destroy villages so the army has less food and its signed by General Rion of Estrace.

012.name: You
012.text: I have to warn the lord.
